thread.title: Butch Wilson Scholarship Horseshoe Tournament gathers scholarships for Hannibal graduates
thread.title_full: Butch Wilson Scholarship Horseshoe Tournament gathers scholarships for Hannibal graduates

title: Butch Wilson Scholarship Horseshoe Tournament gathers scholarships for Hannibal graduates
text: Butch Wilson Scholarship Horseshoe Tournament gathers scholarships for Hannibal graduates Comment Hannibal Courier - Post - Hannibal, MO Writer Posted Oct. 5, 2015 at 4:20 PM Posted Oct. 5, 2015 at 4:20 PM Hannibal, Mo. The top six teams placing in the Butch Wilson Scholarship Horseshoe Tournament held in September, at the Knights of Columbus were, from left: Heath Otte and Wayne Wilson (first place winners; Time Rees, Gary Culp, Larry Marine, Don Lucas, Nathan Wilson, Steve Wilson, Lisa Willett, Sam Banks, Josh Underhill and Terry Rouse. The tournament is an annual event open to the public, and all proceeds go to the Butch Wilson Memorial Scholarship; $6,000 in scholarships were given out to Hannibal High School graduates last year. Hannibal Courier - Post - Hannibal, MO Writer
